abstract.p: This package contains two Fortran subroutine libraries, MSG and ERR, which can be used to provide informational text to the user from any application program. It also contains a preliminary C interface for the two libraries -- this may be subject to change in the light of experience.
The Message Reporting System, MSG, is used for reporting non-error information and the Error Reporting System, ERR, is used specifically for reporting error messages.
